header.topics: Studies, hair, staying in Marin’s flat, Airbnb, mutual friends, utilities, internet, tea, Japanese wedding attire, family wedding, honeymoon, Hawaii, holiday activities, hairstyles, family memories, food, Indian restaurants, guests, staying out of London with friends, neighbour noise, pets, spiders, Bishop’s Stortford, moving out of London, job-seeking, renewing visas, health, friends, stress, finances, work methods, winter, family, cultural differences, charity work, managing difficulty, religion, research groups, exhibition, social media
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, advising, inviting, announcing, anecdote telling, making arrangements, apologising, telling jokes

speaker.fls: French -- level unspecified; Italian -- level unspecified

body.u: you know two more deadlines I sudden handed in my thesis erm the end of well you er I handed in the first no second of November I had to work through that weekend the the last weekend of October hand it on the second although m I it was due on the thirty-first but thirty-first was Saturday so I submitted it on the Monday which was the second and then after that I had to finish this paper for the scientific journal article journal article that was also about three four thousand words that we had been working on as a team but I had been hoarding it because I my priority was the thesis so after that I er went back to this manuscript and then finished it off done a few edits over a few days and then after that I had then had to deal with this another paper another journal
